signup.promotion_info: Yes, I love being the first to know. Send me personalized updates about special offers, new services and features, promotions and information about Struum.
signup.legal_info.prefix: By clicking “Continue” you confirm you are over 18, agree to our
signup.legal_info.suffix: . Cancel anytime before your next billing date to avoid future charges.
singnup.legal_info_instruction: By clicking Continue you confirm you are over 18, agree to our Terms of Use and acknowledge our Privacy Policy. You agree that your subscription will begin immediately and you will not be able to withdraw from the contract and receive a refund. We will automatically continue your subscription at the end of your free trial and charge the monthly fee to your payment method, until you cancel. Cancel anytime before your next billing date to avoid future charges.
signup.notice: Watch content by redeeming your Struum credits. Credits required varies by content. 30 days of unlimited viewing. One time purchase of additional credits available in app. 2,000 max credit limit applies. Credits do not expire. Active subscription required to redeem credits. Terms & Conditions apply.
signup.billing: Billing begins immediately when you subscribe and continues monthly. Cancel anytime.

main.title: Value Proposition
main.title_tv1: Access to all the latest channels in one place
main.text: Amet tellus orci mi risus ultricies aliquam nisl.
main.text.0: Use credits to access shows and movies from 20+ services with one subscription.
main.text.1: Unlock 1000s of stories that suit your interests - from travel to true crime.
main.text.2: 100 credits for only $4.99 per month. Binged all your credits? Add more.
main.disclaimer.1: Disclaimer: *$4.99 is a special offer that gives you 50 credits plus a bonus 50 credits per month. **Credits required to watch vary by program, generally episodes are 3-4 credits and movies are 6-7 credits. Unused credits roll over.
